meta.label: Deep learning on images (GPU) - Legacy
meta.description:
Use a pre-trained model to score images or extract features. You can retrain generic models to specialize them on a particular set of images.

This GPU version requires an NVIDIA GPU with CUDA 8.0 and cudNN 6.0 installed

⚠️ This plugin is now "legacy". For the latest features, we recommend using the new Deeplearning Image plugin
meta.author: Dataiku (Nicolas Servel)
